1612007867_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: Actual journalism doesn't exist in any mainstream media outlet. The job of the media is to form a public opinion, which can be exploited by the same corporations who fund the press. What comes to the "scientific method" This method assumes that we already have the full knowledge of the absolute and objective truth. It relies on the fact, that all of our former conclusions are undeniable facts. If any of these so called facts would be proven false in the future, then the whole house of cards would fall, and now according to the "scientific theory" everything that we have ever observed, is to be considered false. This doesn't make any sense and basically confirms that nothing can be claimed to be absolute, since everything can always be proven false and if this isn't the case, then how do we know that it can't be?
